gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 117, Hawks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Hawks, 117-110, in overtime. Trae Young recorded 31 points and nine assists for the Hawks, while Dejounte Murray added 24 points and six rebounds in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 35 points and 10 rebounds for the Magic in the losing effort, his second consecutive game with 35+ points and 10+ rebounds. The Magic have won back-to-back games as they improve to 21-15 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 14-21.
